DOC.brief_summary: To make nelfinavir mesylate ( Viracept ) available treatment HIV positive patient unable take three commercially available protease inhibitor ( failure , intolerance , contraindication ) CD4 cell count < = 50 . To obtain additional information safety profile nelfinavir mesylate ( Viracept ) . ( PER AMENDMENT 1/8/97 : People qualify Viracept Program unable take indinavir and/or ritonavir due intolerance , contraindication prior failure . )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV infection . CD4 T cell count < = 100 cells/mm3 . Failed , intolerant contraindication three commercially available protease inhibitor ( saquinavir , indinavir ritonavir ) . ( PER AMENDMENT 1/8/97 : People qualify Viracept Program unable take indinavir and/or ritonavir due intolerance , contraindication prior failure . ) Exclusion Criteria Prior Medication : Excluded : Prior therapy Viracept . Required : Indinavir . Saquinavir . Ritonavir .
